00014 DepthDebugVisualization::DepthDebugVisualization(QWidget *_parent) : QGLWidget( new CreateCoreGLContext(QGLFormat::defaultFormat()), _parent )
00015 
00016 {
00017 
00018   // set this widget to have the initial keyboard focus
00019  // setFocus();
00020   // re-size the widget to that of the parent (in this case the GLFrame passed in on construction)
00021   this->resize(_parent->size());
00022   startTimer(20);
00023   m_depth = cvCreateMat(480,640,CV_8UC1);
00024 
00025 }
00026 
00027 // This virtual function is called once before the first call to paintGL() or resizeGL(),
00028 //and then once whenever the widget has been assigned a new QGLContext.
00029 // This function should set up any required OpenGL context rendering flags, defining display lists, etc.
00030 
00031 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00032 void DepthDebugVisualization::initializeGL()
00033 {
00034   //
00035   ngl::NGLInit *Init = ngl::NGLInit::instance();
00036   Init->initGlew();
00037 
00038   // now we have valid GL can create shaders etc
00039   ngl::ShaderLib *shader = ngl::ShaderLib::instance();
00040   shader->createShaderProgram("TextureDepth");
00041 
00042   shader->attachShader("TextureVertex",ngl::VERTEX);
00043   shader->attachShader("TextureFragment",ngl::FRAGMENT);
00044   shader->loadShaderSource("TextureVertex","shaders/TextureVert.glsl");
00045   shader->loadShaderSource("TextureFragment","shaders/LumFrag.glsl");
00046 
00047   shader->compileShader("TextureVertex");
00048   shader->compileShader("TextureFragment");
00049   shader->attachShaderToProgram("TextureDepth","TextureVertex");
00050   shader->attachShaderToProgram("TextureDepth","TextureFragment");
00051 
00052   shader->linkProgramObject("TextureDepth");
00053   (*shader)["TextureDepth"]->use();
00054   shader->setShaderParam1i("tex",0);
00055 
00056   m_screen = new ScreenQuad(640,480,"TextureDepth");
00057   // set this to draw depth textures
00058   m_screen->setTextureMode(GL_DEPTH_COMPONENT );
00059 
00060   //frame rate GUNDU
00061   //m_text=new ngl::Text(QFont("Arial",14));
00062   //currentTime = currentTime.currentTime();
00063 }
00064

00069                         int _w,
00070                         int _h
00071                        )

00073   glViewport(0,0,_w,_h);

00075   //m_text->setScreenSize(_w,_h);
00076 }
00077 
00078 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00079 //This virtual function is called whenever the widget needs to be painted.
00080 // this is our main drawing routine
00081 void DepthDebugVisualization::paintGL()
00082 {
00083     //int temp = 0;
00084     glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
00085 
00086     KinectInterface *kinect=KinectInterface::instance();
00087     // this is the raw data will need to be processed
00088     kinect->getDepthSliced(m_depth);
00089 
00090     m_screen->draw(&m_depth);
00091 }

00116 void DepthDebugVisualization::timerEvent( QTimerEvent *_event )
00117 {
00118     Q_UNUSED(_event);
